title: Why Does Misery Love Company? | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today on a soul torching episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

Misery loves company, such is the case for a young child being brought up in an abusive household. 

As he grows older he starts to notice things happening in and around the house, that can not be explained as anything other than, paranormal. 

Could these dark forces that linger in his family be the true source of such deplorable behavior? 

Could something evil have taken over the family, and, be coming for his soul next?

We ask that question, and dig much deeper, on todays episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support.
